name: Rivet (Ratchet and Clank)
description:
Rivet, cute Lombax girl from Ratchet and Clank

Use furry, rivetlombax at the start of the prompt to summon her, use blue eyes, animal ears, earrings, goggles on head, bangs to form her head, use mechanical arms to summon her mechanical arms, use scarf, bodysuit, belt, tail to make her body

Trained on NovelAI

meta.prompt: furry, rivetlombax, blue eyes, animal ears, earrings, goggles on head, bangs, mechanical arms, scarf, bodysuit, belt, tail, forest, smile, <lora:Rivet:0.95>
